turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can hear myself in the background. Did you remember to put on headphones or earbuds?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hmm, maybe can you turn down the volume?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Maybe that will help, let me see.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that helps a little bit. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I need three large pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe chicken barbecue. Is that possible?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is that chicken BBQ for all 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I got for you 3 large BBQ chicken pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large BBQ chicken pizzas, with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Where am I ordering from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me get you the total really quickly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for those 3 large pizzas will be $62.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, there is no problem. I'll pay. Close the order. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All set! Your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome. Have a good one.
